quote: Poetry's always dead, you know? You don't realize how good poetry is until 15 years later.
name: Richard Hell

quote: Clarity, clarity, surely clarity is the most beautiful thing in the world, A limited, limiting clarity I have not and never did have any motive of poetry But to achieve clarity.
name: George Oppen

quote: The first question at that time in poetry was simply the question of honesty, of sincerity.
name: George Oppen

quote: Freedom is poetry, taking liberties with words, breaking the rules of normal speech, violating common sense. Freedom is violence.
name: Norman O. Brown

quote: Stadium rock and commercial rock are the opposite of what poetry needs. An audience of around 200 is ideal for poetry.
name: Adrian Mitchell

quote: I use rock and jazz and blues rhythms because I love that music. I hope my poetry has a relationship with good-time rock'n roll.
name: Adrian Mitchell

quote: Reality only reveals itself when it is illuminated by a ray of poetry.
name: Georges Braque

quote: Well, I write a lot of poetry - that's where it usually all starts. I definitely want to show you guys sides of me - love, loss, heartbreak - all of that good stuff!
name: Tristan Wilds

quote: Too many people in the modern world view poetry as a luxury, not a necessity like petrol. But to me it's the oil of life.
name: John Betjeman

quote: For poetry there exists neither large countries nor small. Its domain is in the heart of all men.
name: Giorgos Seferis

quote: The urge to write poetry is like having an itch. When the itch becomes annoying enough, you scratch it.
name: Robert Penn Warren

quote: My father had wanted to name me for Dylan Thomas. He had seen him speak on one of those drunken poetry tours he did.
name: Dylan Walsh

quote: I found that it wasn't so oddball to like music and poetry and visual arts, they're kindred spirits.
name: J. Carter Brown

quote: I think it was T.S. Eliot who talked about good poetry being felt before it's understood. I believe that. There are some bands where I love their lyrics but I don't have a clue what they're on about.
name: Marcus Mumford

quote: I don't think Auden liked my poetry very much, he's very Anglican.
name: Stevie Smith

quote: All poetry has to do is to make a strong communication. All the poet has to do is listen. The poet is not an important fellow. There will also be another poet.
name: Stevie Smith

quote: Religion is no more possible without prayer than poetry without language, or music without atmosphere.
name: James Martineau

quote: There's not a good poet I know who has not at the beck and call of his memory a vast quantity of poetry that composes his mental library.
name: Anthony Hecht

quote: What is poetry which does not save nations or people?
name: Czeslaw Milosz

quote: Theater and poetry were what helped people stay alive and want to go on living.
name: Vanessa Redgrave

quote: I started off in England and very few people knew I was Australian. I mean, the clues were in the poems, but they didn't read them very carefully, and so for years and years I was considered completely part of the English poetry scene.
name: Peter Porter

quote: Poetry is of so subtle a spirit, that in the pouring out of one language into another it will evaporate.
name: John Denham

quote: Don't call my lyrics poetry. It's an insult to real poets.
name: Bernie Taupin

quote: You don't go after poetry, you take what comes. Maybe the gods do it through me but I certainly do a hell of a lot of the work.
name: Phyllis Gotlieb

quote: This career essentially chased me down while I was on the spoken-word scene in New York. I kept hearing that my delivery of my poetry - which was very personal and cathartic at the time- was very moving to folks. People thought that I was an actress because of my delivery, when I was just dropping into the work and really pouring out my soul.
name: Sonja Sohn

quote: As I got older, I really got into Tupac's poetry, his books and just learning about his life and what he was into.
name: Jhene Aiko

quote: Let me read you some of my poetry. My poetry just takes me to another level.
name: Rick Fox

quote: Great poetry is always written by somebody straining to go beyond what he can do.
name: Stephen Spender

quote: The mystic purchases a moment of exhilaration with a lifetime of confusion and the confusion is infectious and destructive. It is confusing and destructive to try and explain anything in terms of anything else, poetry in terms of psychology.
name: Basil Bunting

quote: I don't look on poetry as closed works. I feel they're going on all the time in my head and I occasionally snip off a length.
name: John Ashbery

quote: What does that represent? There was never any question in plastic art, in poetry, in music, of representing anything. It is a matter of making something beautiful, moving, or dramatic - this is by no means the same thing.
name: Fernand Leger

quote: Poetry must be made by all and not by one.
name: Comte de Lautreamont

quote: So much of my poetry begins with something that I can describe in visual terms, so thinking about distance, thinking about how life begins and what might be watching us.
name: Tracy K. Smith

quote: Poetry criticism at its worst today is mean in spirit and spiteful in intent, as if determined to inflict the wound that will spur the artist to new heights if it does not cripple him or her.
name: David Lehman

quote: The older I've got the less I find myself going back and re-reading or really reading new fiction or poetry.
name: Reynolds Price

quote: To feel most beautifully alive means to be reading something beautiful, ready always to apprehend in the flow of language the sudden flash of poetry.
name: John Andrew Holmes

quote: Poetry is a sort of homecoming.
name: Paul Celan

quote: Women who are inclined to write poetry at all are inspired by being mad at something.
name: Amy Clampitt

quote: Poetry is an art, and chief of the fine art the easiest to dabble in, the hardest in which to reach true excellence.
name: Edmund Clarence Stedman

quote: Poetry is an art, the easiest to dabble in, but the hardest to reach true excellence.
name: J. G. Stedman

quote: For a poet to depict a poet in poetry is a hazardous experiment in regarding one's own trade a sense of humour and a little wholesome cynicism are not amiss.
name: Edward Dowden

quote: That's the way it is with poetry: When it is incomprehensible it seems profound, and when you understand it, it is only ridiculous.
name: Galway Kinnell

quote: Who writes poetry imbibes honey from the poisoned lips of life.
name: William Rose Benet

quote: Music has a poetry of its own, and that poetry is called melody.
name: Joshua Logan

quote: Poetry is like making a joke. If you get one word wrong at the end of a joke, you've lost the whole thing.
name: W. S. Merwin

quote: I could no more define poetry than a terrier can define a rat.
name: Alfred Edward Housman

quote: I wrote The Green Eye of the Little Yellow God in five hours, but I had it all planned out. It isn't poetry and it does not pretend to be, but it does what it sets out to do.
name: J. Milton Hayes

quote: I'm looking for a guy who makes you want to dance and write poetry all day long.
name: Angela Sarafyan

quote: Poetry is a matter of life, not just a matter of language.
name: Lucille Clifton

quote: Some say they see poetry in my paintings I see only science.
name: Georges Seurat

quote: I didn't want to deal in poetry. I got rid of that after a few months.
name: Tom Wesselmann

quote: For me, poetry is always a search for order.
name: Elizabeth Jennings

quote: All good poetry is forged slowly and patiently, link by link, with sweat and blood and tears.
name: Alfred Douglas

quote: I don't know a better preparation for life than a love of poetry and a good digestion.
name: Zona Gale

quote: For there is a sound reasoning upon all flowers. For flowers are peculiarly the poetry of Christ.
name: Christopher Smart

quote: Poetry asks people to have values, form opinions, care about some other part of experience besides making money and being successful on the job.
name: Toi Derricotte

quote: Poetry uses the hub of a torque converter for a jello mold.
name: Diane Glancy

quote: He fertilizes a phrase or a line of poetry for weeks and then gives birth to it in a speech.
name: John Colville

quote: I write poetry in order to live more fully.
name: Judith Rodriguez
